overview:
Elie Habib is the President, and CEO of Vusion.

Prior to Vusion, Elie served as Senior Vice President and General Manager of the Security and Mobile Connectivity business Unit at Nokia. Before assuming his SVP role, Elie was Vice President of the Global Product organization for Nokia Internet Communications (NIC), VP of Engineering at Ramp Networks (acquired by Nokia), VP of Enginering at Bay Networks (acquired by Nortel Networks), and various management and engineering positions at Sun Microsystems.

Mr. Habib holds a MS in Computer Science from Case Western Reserve University and a Maitrise in Computer Science from the Universite de Toulouse, France.
